evaluations.reasoning: D360 Bank’s internal profile shows 326 employees with a +46.8 % YoY growth and a workforce increase of 388 people from 2022‑11 to 2025‑10, indicating ongoing expansion【1】. Recent 2025 news (e.g., September 2025 partnership with TerraPay and MoneyGram, and a one‑million‑customer milestone) further signals operational growth【2】. The company also has $439.7 M in total funding, satisfying the “has received funding” part of the criterion【1】. All evidence points to D360 Bank meeting the criterion as of 2025.

references.title: What's Going On In Banking 2025 | Cornerstone Advisors
references.snippet:
What is going to happen to banks in 2025?
Big fintech is viewed as the biggest threat by both banks and credit unions. In 2025, 28% of banks and 29% of credit unions plan to implement generative AI tools for the first time. 45% of banks and 38% of credit unions offer real-time payments—although roughly 8 in 10 only receive payments.

properties.description: Private Saudi banking company licensed in 2021; 208 employees with 23.6% YoY growth, actively expanding operations and hiring in 2025; provides fully secured digital banking services for personal and enterprise clients, emphasizing Sharia compliance and customer-centric solutions.
properties.content:
## The Future of Smart Banking Starts With You

### We bring you carefully designed financial solutions tailored to meet your needs and aspirations, helping you achieve your financial goals effortlessly and enhancing your quality of life.

Create a Murabaha Term Deposit in less than a minute with an amount of only 1,000 SAR Enjoy competitive returns with short to long terms starting from just seven days.

Vision Bank savings account taking just seconds to open and its designed to help you achieve your goals with simple and confident steps.

Choose from a variety of designs to find the card that suits you best, all while maintaining privacy and security.

1. ## Security is Our Priority



We employ the best practices and cutting-edge technologies to deliver reliable banking services.


Item 1 of 4

## FAQs

### Is Vision Bank licensed in Saudi Arabia?

Yes, Vision Bank is licensed in KSA and regulated and supervised by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA).

### Is Vision Bank compliant with Islamic Shariah Principles?

Yes.

### Is Vision Bank a wallet?

No. Vision Bank is a digital bank that will offer a full range of financial solutions.

### When will I have an account with Vision Bank?

Register on the priority list through the Vision Bank website or application. When it is your turn, you will receive an SMS with an invite code to open your account. This code can only be used once.

© 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved.

Closed Joint Stock Company with a Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000, CR No. 1010850478 Licensed in accordance with the Council of Ministers decree No. 672 dated 12/11/1442H corresponding to 22/06/2021G, Subject to the supervision of the Saudi Central Bank, 6537 King Abdulaziz Rd., King Salman Dist. 12432 Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

## © 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved. Closed Joint Stock Company, Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000. Commercial Registration 1010850478, National Address 6537 Riyadh 12432-2693, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

properties.description: Al Rajhi Capital is a private financial services company based in Saudi Arabia, with 359 employees and $129.6M annual revenue. It is a leading, award-winning investment arm of Al Rajhi Bank, licensed by the Saudi Capital Market Authority, and actively expanding in 2025 with recent hires and a 20.9% YoY workforce growth.

company.name: Al Rajhi Capital
company.about:
الراجحي المالية هي وجهتك الأولى للاستثمار، حيث تكرّس التقنية الحديثة لتقديم أرقى وأفضل الخدمات الاستثمارية. باعتبارها الذراع الاستثماري لمصرف الراجحي، فهي مرخصة من قبل #هيئة_السوق_المالية، وتلتزم بتقديم استثمارات متوافقة مع مبادئ الهيئة الشرعية. تتمثل رسالتنا في تقديم حلول استثمارية مبتكرة تحقق أفضل العوائد وتعزز ثقة عملائنا.
ومن خلال خبراتنا و كفاءاتنا نقدّم خدمات استثمارية متميزة مصمّمة لتلبّية احتياجات عملائنا وتحقيق أهدافهم المالية، عن طريق تقديم حلول شاملة للمؤسسات والشركات والأفراد تشمل إدارة الأصول والوساطة والخدمات المصرفية الاستثمارية.
 يتميز تطبيق #الراجحي_المالية بوجود الصناديق الاستثمارية والأسهم المحلية والإقليمية والدولية، إضافة إلى خدمة الذكاء الاصطناعي الراجحي مشورة، كما يتيح طرق دفع متنوعة لتسهيل تجربة المستخدم، ولا تقتصر إمكانية فتح الحساب الاستثماري على عملاء مصرف الراجحي بل تمتدّ لتشمل عملاء جميع البنوك عبر إتاحة التسجيل برقم الهوية الشخصية فقط. 

 #استثمر_بالخبرة

Al Rajhi Capital's mission is to provide you with high quality investment banking products and services that are tailor-made to meet your particular requirements. In addition, our investments comply with the guidelines of the Al Rajhi Capital Shariah Board. Al Rajhi Capital is based on the solid values and investment experience established by Al Rajhi Bank, a leader in banking products and services. Our staff has a breadth of global expertise and experience to assist clients in fulfilling their investment goals.

Comprehensive investment solutions for corporations, companies and individuals, among which are: Asset Management, Brokerage and Investment Banking, are provided through Al Rajhi Capital.

We, at Al Rajhi Capital work unceasingly to provide our clients with only the finest of investment services.
